title: Create User Detail Component
description: Develop UI component for displaying detailed user profile information

user_stories: As a service provider, I want to view detailed user profiles so that I can access customer information
As a user, I want to see my profile information so that I can verify its accuracy
business_rules: User detail view must show complete user information
User detail view must follow the design system
User detail view must handle loading states and error messages
User detail view must respect privacy controls
edge_cases: Handling loading states for user details
Managing error conditions when user data is not available
Displaying user profile information with proper privacy controls
Handling different user types with varying information fields

acceptance_criteria: User detail component shows complete user information
User detail component follows the design system
User detail component handles loading states and error conditions properly
User detail component integrates with User Management API endpoints
User detail component respects privacy controls for information display

integration_tests: User detail integration with backend APIs

additional_context.technical_notes: Implement user detail component following Angular best practices. Ensure proper integration with user management API. Implement appropriate privacy controls.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure proper authorization checks for user detail access. Implement appropriate privacy controls for user information display. Protect sensitive user information.
